template.name: ploneBehaviorThumbIconHandling
template.description: Adds options to suppress thumbs(preview images) and/or icons and to override thumb size in listings or tables.

template.name: ploneBehaviorTableOfContents
template.description: Table of contents.

template.name: ploneBehaviorShortName
template.description: Gives the ability to rename an item from its edit form.

template.name: ploneBehaviorSelectableConstrainTypes
template.description: Restrict the content types that can be added to folderish content

template.name: ploneBehaviorRichText
template.description: Rich text field with a WYSIWIG editor.

template.name: ploneBehaviorRelatedItems
template.description: Adds the Related items field to the Categorization fieldset.

template.name: ploneBehaviorPublication
template.description: Adds effective date and expiration date fields.

template.name: ploneBehaviorOwnership
template.description: Adds creator, contributor, and rights fields.

template.name: ploneBehaviorNextPreviousToggle
template.description: Allow items to have next previous navigation enabled.

template.name: ploneBehaviorNextPreviousEnabled
template.description: Enable next previous navigation for all items of this type. Not a form field provider.

template.name: ploneBehaviorNavigationRoot
template.description: Make all items of this type a navigation root. Not a form field provider.

template.name: ploneBehaviorNameFromFileName
template.description: Automatically generate short URL name for content based on its primary field file name Not a form field provider.

template.name: ploneBehaviorLeadImage
template.description: Adds a LeadImage field like used for News item.

template.name: ploneBehaviorExcludeFromNavigation
template.description: Allow items to be excluded from navigation

template.name: ploneBehaviorDublinCore
template.description: Adds standard metadata fields. Shortcut for (and same as) plone.basic + plone.categorization + plone.publication + plone.ownership)

template.name: ploneBehaviorCollection
template.description: Collection behavior with querystring and other related fields.

template.name: ploneBehaviorCategorization
template.description: Adds keywords and language fields.

template.name: ploneBehaviorBasic
template.description: Adds title and description fields.

template.name: ploneBehaviorAllowDiscussion
template.description: Allow discussion on this item.

template.name: ploneBehaviorNameFromTitle
template.description: Automatically generate short URL name for content based on its initial title. Not a form field provider.
